summary: Elizabeth L. Berning was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). She is listed in payroll and certification reports from April 1978 to December 1978. The documents provide her name, and in some cases, her salary and gross pay during her employment with the SCAS.
significance: Elizabeth L. Berning's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, though the specific nature and extent of her role are not detailed in these documents.
